医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
带状疱疹疫苗接种与健康老龄化：研究将这些点联系起来接种重组带状疱疹疫苗 (RZV) 可预防带状疱疹 (HZ) 感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Herpes-zoster-vaccination-and-healthy-aging-Study-connect-the-dots.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Herpes-zoster-vaccination-and-healthy-aging-Study-connect-the-dots.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e97eca74-56a1-4ba4-8fe2-10e50634a885 Thu, 30 Nov 2023 05:14:00 -0500 Herpes zoster vaccination and healthy aging: Study connect the dots
新研究提供了令人信服的证据，证明 Cylicins 在精子发育和生育能力中的重要作用研究人员通过成簇规则间隔短回文重复序列 (CRISPR)/CRISPR 相关蛋白 9 (Cas9) 基因编辑研究了 Cylicins 在小鼠和人类精子发生和男性生育能力中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/New-study-provides-concincing-evidence-of-the-essential-role-of-cylicins-in-sperm-development-and-fertility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/New-study-provides-concincing-evidence-of-the-essential-role-of-cylicins-in-sperm-development-and-fertility.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4be5a06b-0865-41c3-8ae1-0204b2f73a9d Thu, 30 Nov 2023 05:02:00 -0500 New study provides convincing evidence of the essential role of cylicins in sperm development and fertility
植物性饮食如何影响体重？植物性饮食指数 (PDI)、不健康 PDI (uPDI) 和健康 PDI (hPDI) 与减肥之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/How-do-plant-based-diets-impact-body-weight.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/How-do-plant-based-diets-impact-body-weight.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e00e230-f062-43a9-ad38-a1eae44f555c Thu, 30 Nov 2023 04:42:00 -0500 How do plant-based diets impact body weight?
跨诊断、混合生态瞬时干预能否改善自尊心低且曾经历过童年逆境的青少年的自尊？ 《美国医学会杂志精神病学》上的一项新研究报告了一项为期四年的随机临床试验 (RCT) 的结果，该试验对童年时期有逆境史的年轻人进行单独常规护理或结合自拍（EMI 的一种形式）进行比较。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Can-a-transdiagnostic-blished-ecological-momentary-intervention-improve-self-spectr-in-youth-with-low-self-spectr-and-先前经历过的童年逆境.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Can-a-transdiagnostic-blished-ecological-momentary-intervention-improve-self-spectr-in-youth-with-low-self-spectr-and-先前暴露于童年逆境.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21b2e0d9-e7c2-48e5-8b8f-2432815232f9 Thu, 30 Nov 2023 04:27:00 -0500 Can a transdiagnostic, blended ecological momentary intervention improve self-esteem in youth with low self-esteem and prior exposure to childhood adversity?
维生素 K 对骨骼健康的影响关于维生素 K (VK) 对骨骼健康影响的现有科学数据并阐明了其潜在机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/The-effects-of-vitamin-K-on-bone-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/The-effects-of-vitamin-K-on-bone-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0441f943-d998-4b79-9b56-d5d82633447f Thu, 30 Nov 2023 04:06:00 -0500 The effects of vitamin K on bone health
智能手机数据揭示了快餐店与饮食相关疾病之间的联系您一天中会遇到多少家快餐店？这与您的健康有什么关系？南加州大学信息科学研究所 (ISI) 的首席科学家阿比盖尔·霍恩 (Abigail Horn) 表示，很多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Smartphone-data-reveals-the-link- Between-fast-food-outlets-and-diet-lated-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Smartphone-data-reveals-the-link- Between-fast-food-outlets-and-diet-lated-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d573d8a-5836-4f87-a063-be770fd965bd Wed, 29 Nov 2023 23:56:17 -0500 Smartphone data reveals the link between fast food outlets and diet-related diseases
研究发现前三类药物比布洛芬更有效治疗偏头痛发作对于许多偏头痛患者来说，找到一种有效且可靠的治疗方法可能很困难，并且缺乏有关药物之间如何比较的信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Study-finds-top- Three-classes-of-medications-more- effective-than-ibuprofen-for-treating-migraine-attacks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Study-finds-top- Three-classes-of-medications-more- effective-than-ibuprofen-for-treating-migraine-attacks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=717697d5-9ff2-4441-9ce2-2f4ae00408c2 Wed, 29 Nov 2023 23:29:07 -0500 Study finds top three classes of medications more effective than ibuprofen for treating migraine attacks
主动监测宫颈癌前病变与长期癌症风险增加有关英国医学杂志今天发表的一项研究表明，积极监测宫颈内的异常细胞（病变）而不是立即去除它们会增加患宫颈癌的长期风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Active-surveillance-for-cervical-precancer-lesions-linked-to-increased-long-term-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Active-surveillance-for-cervical-precancer-lesions-linked-to-increased-long-term-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe4b7b6f-049c-4409-8de1-a0ad11ff05fc Wed, 29 Nov 2023 23:21:20 -0500 Active surveillance for cervical precancer lesions linked to increased long-term cancer risk
研究揭示了音乐对我们道德指南针的深远影响发表在《PLOS ONE》上的一项新研究揭示了个人的音乐偏好与其道德价值观之间的显着联系，为音乐对我们道德指南针的深远影响提供了新的线索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Study-sheds-new-light-on-the-profound-influence-of-music-on-our-moral-compass.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Study-sheds-new-light-on-the-profound-influence-of-music-on-our-moral-compass.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72932d5f-0e7d-4a74-9667-e08d6dd3f7d7 Wed, 29 Nov 2023 22:56:00 -0500
研究表明打篮球可以提高孩子的动手能力《科学报告》中的一项研究表明，打篮球可以显着提高儿童的手部灵活性，优于其他体育和非体育活动。该研究强调了篮球对手眼协调和运动技能的独特要求，表明它作为一种有效的非临床方法来提高年轻人的手灵巧度的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Study-shows-basketball-playing-sharpens-manual-dexterity-in-kids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Study-shows-basketball-playing-sharpens-manual-dexterity-in-kids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a994fe98-a45c-4f8a-8150-d4e65d7c73a4 Wed, 29 Nov 2023 22:49:00 -0500 Study shows basketball playing sharpens manual dexterity in kids
